---
title: "Metric"
description: "A measure of performance of a model. It is used by humans to judge the performance of the model."
---

---

Examples of metrics are, but not limited to, [accuracy](accuracy.qmd), [error rate](error_rate.qmd), [MAE](mae_mean_absolute_error.qmd), and [MSE](mse_mean_squared_error.qmd)
